property.name: bulletChar
property.shortdesc: Bullet character.

property.name: numberingRestartPolicies
property.shortdesc: Numbering restart policies.

property.name: associatedXMLElements
property.shortdesc: The XML elements associated with the Word.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the text in the collection or parent object.

property.name: parentStory
property.shortdesc: The story that contains the text.

property.name: parentTextFrames
property.shortdesc: An array of the text frames that contain the text. Can return: Array of TextFrames or TextPaths.

property.name: ascent
property.shortdesc: The maximum ascent of any character in the text.

property.name: descent
property.shortdesc: The maximum descent of any character in the text.

property.name: baseline
property.shortdesc: The vertical offset of the text.

property.name: horizontalOffset
property.shortdesc: The horizontal offset of the text.

property.name: styleOverridden
property.shortdesc: If true, the applied style has been overridden with additional attributes.

property.name: endBaseline
property.shortdesc: Vertical offset of the end of the text.

property.name: endHorizontalOffset
property.shortdesc: Horizontal offset of the end of the text.

property.name: appliedNestedStyles
property.shortdesc: The applied character styles dictated by nested styles.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the Word.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the Word.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Word &#40;a XmlStory, TextPath, TextFrame, Text, InsertionPoint, TextStyleRange, Paragraph, TextColumn, Line, Word, Character, Story, Cell, XMLElement, Footnote, Note, Change or HiddenText).

property.name: texts
property.shortdesc: A collection of text objects.

property.name: characters
property.shortdesc: A collection of characters.

property.name: words
property.shortdesc: A collection of words.

property.name: lines
property.shortdesc: A collection of lines.

property.name: textColumns
property.shortdesc: A collection of text columns.

property.name: paragraphs
property.shortdesc: A collection of paragraphs.

property.name: insertionPoints
property.shortdesc: A collection of insertion points.

property.name: textStyleRanges
property.shortdesc: A collection of text style ranges.

property.name: footnotes
property.shortdesc: A collection of footnotes.

property.name: textVariableInstances
property.shortdesc: A collection of text variable instances.

property.name: nestedLineStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of nested line styles.

property.name: nestedGrepStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of nested GREP styles.

property.name: nestedStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of nested styles.

property.name: tabStops
property.shortdesc: A collection of tab stops.

property.name: tables
property.shortdesc: A collection of tables.

property.name: ovals
property.shortdesc: A collection of ellipses.

property.name: splineItems
property.shortdesc: The spline items collection.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container &#40;such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: rectangles
property.shortdesc: A collection of rectangles.

property.name: graphicLines
property.shortdesc: A collection of graphic lines.

property.name: textFrames
property.shortdesc: A collection of text frames.

property.name: polygons
property.shortdesc: A collection of polygons.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: notes
property.shortdesc: A collection of notes.

property.name: groups
property.shortdesc: A collection of groups.

property.name: epstexts
property.shortdesc: EPSTexts

property.name: formFields
property.shortdesc: A collection of form fields.

property.name: buttons
property.shortdesc: A collection of buttons.

property.name: multiStateObjects
property.shortdesc: A collection of multi-state objects.

property.name: checkBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of checkboxes.

property.name: comboBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of comboboxes.

property.name: listBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of listboxes.

property.name: radioButtons
property.shortdesc: A collection of radio buttons.

property.name: textBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of text boxes.

property.name: signatureFields
property.shortdesc: A collection of signature fields.

property.name: hiddenTexts
property.shortdesc: A collection of hidden text objects.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: tabList
property.shortdesc: A list of the tab stops in the paragraph. Can return: Array of Arrays of Property Name/Value Pairs.

property.name: kerningValue
property.shortdesc: The amount of space to add or remove between characters, specified in thousands of an em.

property.name: appliedFont
property.shortdesc: The font applied to the Word, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font or String.

property.name: fontStyle
property.shortdesc: The name of the font style.

property.name: pointSize
property.shortdesc: The text size.

property.name: leading
property.shortdesc: The leading applied to the text. Can return: Unit or Leading enumerator.

property.name: kerningMethod
property.shortdesc: The type of pair kerning.

property.name: tracking
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to loosen or tighten a block of text, specified in thousands of an em.

property.name: capitalization
property.shortdesc: The capitalization scheme.

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: The text position relative to the baseline.

property.name: underline
property.shortdesc: If true, underlines the text.

property.name: strikeThru
property.shortdesc: If true, draws a strikethrough line through the text.

property.name: ligatures
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces specific character combinations &#40;e.g., fl, fi) with ligature characters.

property.name: noBreak
property.shortdesc: If true, keeps the text on the same line.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scaling applied to the Word.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scaling applied to the Word.

property.name: baselineShift
property.shortdesc: The baseline shift applied to the text.

property.name: skew
property.shortdesc: The skew angle of the Word.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the fill color of the Word. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: strokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the stroke color of the Word. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight applied to the characters of the text.

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: If true, the stroke of the characters will overprint.

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the fill color of the characters will overprint.

property.name: otfFigureStyle
property.shortdesc: The figure style in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfOrdinal
property.shortdesc: If true, uses ordinals in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfFraction
property.shortdesc: If true, uses fractions in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfDiscretionaryLigature
property.shortdesc: If true, uses discretionary ligatures in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfTitling
property.shortdesc: If true, uses titling forms in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfContextualAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, uses contextual alternate forms in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfSwash
property.shortdesc: If true, uses swash forms in OpenType fonts.

property.name: underlineColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the underline stroke. . Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: underlineGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the underline stroke. Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: underlineTint
property.shortdesc: The underline stroke tint &#40;as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: underlineGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the underline stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when underline type is not solid.

property.name: underlineOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the underline stroke color will overprint.

property.name: underlineGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the underline stroke will overprint.

property.name: underlineType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the underline stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

property.name: underlineOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to offset the underline from the text baseline.

property.name: underlineWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the underline stroke.

property.name: strikeThroughColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: strikeThroughGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: strikeThroughTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: strikeThroughGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid.

property.name: strikeThroughOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the strikethrough stroke will overprint.

property.name: strikeThroughGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid.

property.name: strikeThroughType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

property.name: strikeThroughOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to offset the strikethrough stroke from the text baseline.

property.name: strikeThroughWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the strikethrough stroke.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the Word. . Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the Word. Can also accept: String.

property.name: appliedLanguage
property.shortdesc: The language of the text. Can return: LanguageWithVendors or Language. Can also accept: String.

property.name: paragraphKashidaWidth
property.shortdesc: Paragraph kashida width. 0 is none, 1 is short, 2 is medium, 3 is long

property.name: alignToBaseline
property.shortdesc: If true, aligns the baseline of the text to the baseline grid.

property.name: firstLineIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent the first line.

property.name: leftIndent
property.shortdesc: The width of the left indent.

property.name: rightIndent
property.shortdesc: The width of the right indent.

property.name: spaceBefore
property.shortdesc: The height of the paragraph space above.

property.name: spaceAfter
property.shortdesc: The height of the paragraph space below.

property.name: balanceRaggedLines
property.shortdesc: If true or set to an enumeration value, balances ragged lines. Note: Not valid with a single-line text composer. Can return: Boolean or BalanceLinesStyle enumerator.

property.name: justification
property.shortdesc: The paragraph alignment.

property.name: singleWordJustification
property.shortdesc: The alignment to use for lines that contain a single word.

property.name: autoLeading
property.shortdesc: The percent of the type size to use for auto leading. &#40;Range: 0 to 500).

property.name: dropCapLines
property.shortdesc: The number of lines to drop cap.

property.name: dropCapCharacters
property.shortdesc: The number of characters to drop cap.

property.name: keepLinesTogether
property.shortdesc: If true, keeps a specified number of lines together when the paragraph breaks across columns or text frames.

property.name: keepAllLinesTogether
property.shortdesc: If true, keeps all lines of the paragraph together. If false, allows paragraphs to break across pages or columns.

property.name: keepWithNext
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of lines to keep with the next paragraph.

property.name: keepFirstLines
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph before allowing a page break.

property.name: keepLastLines
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph after a page break.

property.name: startParagraph
property.shortdesc: The location at which to start the paragraph.

property.name: composer
property.shortdesc: The text composer to use to compose the text.

property.name: minimumWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: The minimum word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. Note: Valid only when text is justified. &#40;Range: 0 to 1000)

property.name: maximumWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: The maximum word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. Note: Valid only when text is justified. &#40;Range: 0 to 1000)

property.name: desiredWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: The desired word spacing, specified as a percentage of the font word space value. &#40;Range: 0 to 1000)

property.name: minimumLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: The minimum letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. &#40;Range: -100 to 500) Note: Valid only when text is justified.

property.name: maximumLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: The maximum letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. &#40;Range: -100 to 500) Note: Valid only when text is justified.

property.name: desiredLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: The desired letter spacing, specified as a percentge of the built-in space between letters in the font. &#40;Range: -100 to 500)

property.name: minimumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum width &#40;as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

property.name: maximumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum width &#40;as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

property.name: desiredGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The desired width &#40;as a percentage) of individual characters. (Range: 50 to 200)

property.name: ruleAbove
property.shortdesc: If true, places a rule above the paragraph.

property.name: ruleAboveOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the paragraph rule above will overprint.

property.name: ruleAboveLineWeight
property.shortdesc: The line weight of the rule above.

property.name: ruleAboveTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the paragraph rule above. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: ruleAboveOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the paragraph rule above from the baseline of the first line the paragraph.

property.name: ruleAboveLeftIndent
property.shortdesc: The distance to indent the left edge of the paragraph rule above &#40;based on either the text width or the column width of the first line in the paragraph.

property.name: ruleAboveRightIndent
property.shortdesc: The distance to indent the right edge of the paragraph rule above &#40;based on either the text width or the column width of the first line in the paragraph.

property.name: ruleAboveWidth
property.shortdesc: The basis &#40;text width or column width) used to calculate the width of the paragraph rule above.

property.name: ruleAboveColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the paragraph rule above. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: ruleAboveGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the paragraph rule above. Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule above type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: ruleAboveGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the stroke gap color of the paragraph rule. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when the rule above type is not solid.

property.name: ruleAboveGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the stroke gap of the paragraph rule above will overprint. Note: Valid only the rule above type is not solid.

property.name: ruleAboveType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the rule above the paragraph. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

property.name: ruleBelow
property.shortdesc: If true, applies a paragraph rule below.

property.name: ruleBelowLineWeight
property.shortdesc: The line weight of the rule below.

property.name: ruleBelowTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the paragraph rule below. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: ruleBelowOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount to offset the the paragraph rule below from the baseline of the last line of the paragraph.

property.name: ruleBelowLeftIndent
property.shortdesc: The distance to indent the left edge of the paragraph rule below &#40;based on either the text width or the column width of the last line in the paragraph.

property.name: ruleBelowRightIndent
property.shortdesc: The distance to indent the right edge of the paragraph rule below &#40;based on either the text width or the column width of the last line in the paragraph.

property.name: ruleBelowWidth
property.shortdesc: The basis &#40;text width or column width) used to calculate the width of the paragraph rule below.

property.name: ruleBelowColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the paragraph rule below. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: ruleBelowGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the paragraph rule below. Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule below type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: ruleBelowGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the stroke gap color of the paragraph rule below. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when the paragraph rule below type is not solid.

property.name: ruleBelowType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the rule below the paragraph. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.

property.name: hyphenateCapitalizedWords
property.shortdesc: If true, allows hyphenation of capitalized words.

property.name: hyphenation
property.shortdesc: If true, allows hyphenation.

property.name: hyphenateBeforeLast
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of letters at the end of a word that can be broken by a hyphen.

property.name: hyphenateAfterFirst
property.shortdesc: The mininum number of letters at the beginning of a word that can be broken by a hyphen.

property.name: hyphenateWordsLongerThan
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of letters a word must have in order to qualify for hyphenation.

property.name: hyphenateLadderLimit
property.shortdesc: The maximum number of hyphens that can appear on consecutive lines. To specify unlimited consecutive lines, use zero.

property.name: hyphenationZone
property.shortdesc: The amount of white space allowed at the end of a line of non-justified text before hypenation begins. Note: Valid when composer is single-line composer.

property.name: hyphenWeight
property.shortdesc: The relative desirability of better spacing vs. fewer hyphens. A lower value results in greater use of hyphens. &#40;Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: dropCapStyle
property.shortdesc: The character style to apply to the drop cap. Can also accept: String.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The contents of the text. Can return: String or SpecialCharacters enumerator.

property.name: appliedParagraphStyle
property.shortdesc: The paragraph style applied to the text. Can also accept: String.

property.name: appliedCharacterStyle
property.shortdesc: The character style applied to the text. Can also accept: String.

property.name: lastLineIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent the last line in the paragraph.

property.name: hyphenateLastWord
property.shortdesc: If true, allows hyphenation in the last word in a paragraph. Note: Valid only when hyphenation is true.

property.name: otfSlashedZero
property.shortdesc: If true, use a slashed zeroes in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfHistorical
property.shortdesc: If true, use historical forms in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfStylisticSets
property.shortdesc: The stylistic sets to use in OpenType fonts.

property.name: gradientFillLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the text.

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the text. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientStrokeLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the text.

property.name: gradientStrokeAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the text. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientFillStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the text, in the format [x, y].

property.name: gradientStrokeStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the text, in the format [x, y].

property.name: keepWithPrevious
property.shortdesc: If the first line in the paragraph should be kept with the last line of previous paragraph.

property.name: spanSplitColumnCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns a paragraph spans or the number of split columns. Can return: Short Integer &#40;1 - 40) or SpanColumnCountOptions enumerator.

property.name: spanColumnType
property.shortdesc: Whether a paragraph should be a single column, span columns or split columns

property.name: splitColumnInsideGutter
property.shortdesc: The inside gutter if the paragraph splits columns

property.name: splitColumnOutsideGutter
property.shortdesc: The outside gutter if the paragraph splits columns

property.name: spanColumnMinSpaceBefore
property.shortdesc: The minimum space before a span or a split column

property.name: spanColumnMinSpaceAfter
property.shortdesc: The minimum space after a span or a split column

property.name: ruleBelowOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the rule below will overprint.

property.name: ruleBelowGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the rule below will overprint.

property.name: dropcapDetail
property.shortdesc: Details about the drop cap based on the glyph outlines. 1 = left side bearing. 2 = descenders. 0x100,0x200,0x400 are used for Japanese frame grid.

property.name: hyphenateAcrossColumns
property.shortdesc: If true, allows the last word in a text column to be hyphenated.

property.name: keepRuleAboveInFrame
property.shortdesc: If true, forces the rule above the paragraph to remain in the frame bounds. Note: Valid only when rule above is true.

property.name: ignoreEdgeAlignment
property.shortdesc: If true, ignores optical edge alignment for the paragraph.

property.name: otfMark
property.shortdesc: If true, uses mark positioning in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfLocale
property.shortdesc: If true, uses localized forms in OpenType fonts.

property.name: positionalForm
property.shortdesc: The OpenType positional form.

property.name: paragraphDirection
property.shortdesc: Paragraph direction.

property.name: paragraphJustification
property.shortdesc: Paragraph justification.

property.name: miterLimit
property.shortdesc: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter &#40;pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.

property.name: strokeAlignment
property.shortdesc: The stroke alignment applied to the text.

property.name: endJoin
property.shortdesc: The stroke join type applied to the characters of the text.

property.name: otfOverlapSwash
property.shortdesc: If true, use overlapping swash forms in OpenType fonts

property.name: otfStylisticAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use stylistic alternate forms in OpenType fonts

property.name: otfJustificationAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use alternate justification forms in OpenType fonts

property.name: otfStretchedAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use stretched alternate forms in OpenType fonts

property.name: characterDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of the character.

property.name: keyboardDirection
property.shortdesc: The keyboard direction of the character.

property.name: digitsType
property.shortdesc: The digits type.

property.name: kashidas
property.shortdesc: Use of Kashidas for justification

property.name: diacriticPosition
property.shortdesc: Position of diacriticical characters.

property.name: xOffsetDiacritic
property.shortdesc: The x &#40;horizontal) offset for diacritic adjustment.

property.name: yOffsetDiacritic
property.shortdesc: The y &#40;vertical) offset for diacritic adjustment.

property.name: appliedConditions
property.shortdesc: The applied conditions.

property.name: opentypeFeatures
property.shortdesc: OpenType features. Can return: Array of Array of 2 Strings or Long Integers.

property.name: gridAlignFirstLineOnly
property.shortdesc: If true, aligns only the first line to the frame grid or baseline grid. If false, aligns all lines to the grid.

property.name: gridAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment to the frame grid or baseline grid.

property.name: gridGyoudori
property.shortdesc: The manual gyoudori setting.

property.name: autoTcy
property.shortdesc: The number of half-width characters at or below which the characters automatically run horizontally in vertical text.

property.name: autoTcyIncludeRoman
property.shortdesc: If true, auto tcy includes Roman characters.

property.name: kinsokuSet
property.shortdesc: The kinsoku set that determines legitimate line breaks. Can return: KinsokuTable, KinsokuSet enumerator or String.

property.name: kinsokuType
property.shortdesc: The type of kinsoku processing for preventing kinsoku characters from beginning or ending a line. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is defined.

property.name: kinsokuHangType
property.shortdesc: The type of hanging punctuation to allow. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect.

property.name: bunriKinshi
property.shortdesc: If true, adds the double period &#40;..), ellipse (...), and double hyphen (--) to the selected kinsoku set. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect.

property.name: mojikumi
property.shortdesc: The mojikumi table. For information, see mojikumi table defaults. Can return: MojikumiTable, String or MojikumiTableDefaults enumerator.

property.name: rensuuji
property.shortdesc: If true, disallows line breaks in numbers. If false, lines can break between digits in multi-digit numbers.

property.name: rotateSingleByteCharacters
property.shortdesc: If true, rotates Roman characters in vertical text.

property.name: leadingModel
property.shortdesc: The point from which leading is measured from line to line.

property.name: characterAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of small characters to the largest character in the line.

property.name: tsume
property.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal character compression.

property.name: leadingAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of space before each character.

property.name: trailingAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of space after each character.

property.name: characterRotation
property.shortdesc: The rotation angle &#40;in degrees) of individual characters. Note: The rotation is counterclockwise.

property.name: jidori
property.shortdesc: The number of grid squares in which to arrange the text.

property.name: shataiMagnification
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) of shatai obliquing to apply.

property.name: shataiDegreeAngle
property.shortdesc: The shatai lens angle &#40;in degrees).

property.name: shataiAdjustRotation
property.shortdesc: If true, applies shatai rotation.

property.name: shataiAdjustTsume
property.shortdesc: If true, adjusts shatai tsume.

property.name: tatechuyoko
property.shortdesc: If true, makes the character horizontal in vertical text.

property.name: tatechuyokoXOffset
property.shortdesc: The horizontal offset for horizontal characters in vertical text.

property.name: tatechuyokoYOffset
property.shortdesc: The vertical offset for horizontal characters in vertical text.

property.name: kentenFillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: kentenStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: kentenTint
property.shortdesc: The fill tint &#40;as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: kentenStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The stroke tint &#40;as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: kentenWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight &#40;in points) of kenten characters.

property.name: kentenOverprintFill
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the kenten fill.

property.name: kentenOverprintStroke
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the kenten stroke.

property.name: kentenKind
property.shortdesc: The style of kenten characters.

property.name: kentenPlacement
property.shortdesc: The distance between kenten characters and their parent characters.

property.name: kentenAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of kenten characters relative to the parent characters.

property.name: kentenPosition
property.shortdesc: The kenten position relative to the parent character.

property.name: kentenFont
property.shortdesc: The font to use for kenten characters. Can return: Font or String.

property.name: kentenFontStyle
property.shortdesc: The font style of kenten characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenFontSize
property.shortdesc: The size &#40;in points) of kenten characters.

property.name: kentenXScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal size of kenten characters as a percent of the original size.

property.name: kentenYScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical size of kenten charachers as a percent of the original size.

property.name: kentenCustomCharacter
property.shortdesc: The character used for kenten. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom.

property.name: kentenCharacterSet
property.shortdesc: The character set used for the custom kenten character. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom.

property.name: rubyFill
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: rubyStroke
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch or String.

property.name: rubyTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the ruby fill color. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: rubyWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight &#40;in points) of ruby characters.

property.name: rubyOverprintFill
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the ruby fill.

property.name: rubyOverprintStroke
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the ruby stroke.

property.name: rubyStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The stroke tint &#40;as a percentage) of ruby characters.

property.name: rubyFont
property.shortdesc: The font applied to ruby characters. Can return: Font or String.

property.name: rubyFontStyle
property.shortdesc: The font style of ruby characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyFontSize
property.shortdesc: The size &#40;in points) of ruby characters.

property.name: rubyOpenTypePro
property.shortdesc: If true, uses OpenType Pro fonts for ruby.

property.name: rubyXScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size.

property.name: rubyYScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size.

property.name: rubyType
property.shortdesc: The ruby type.

property.name: rubyAlignment
property.shortdesc: The ruby alignment.

property.name: rubyPosition
property.shortdesc: The position of ruby characters relative to the parent text.

property.name: rubyXOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal space between ruby and parent characters.

property.name: rubyYOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount of vertical space between ruby and parent characters.

property.name: rubyParentSpacing
property.shortdesc: The ruby spacing relative to the parent text.

property.name: rubyAutoAlign
property.shortdesc: If true, auto aligns ruby.

property.name: rubyOverhang
property.shortdesc: If true, constrains ruby overhang to the specified amount. For information on specifying an amount, see ruby parent overhang amount.

property.name: rubyAutoScaling
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically scales ruby to the specified percent of parent text size. For information on specifying a percent, see ruby parent scaling percent.

property.name: rubyParentScalingPercent
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) to scale the parent text size to determine the ruby text size.

property.name: rubyParentOverhangAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount by which ruby characters can overhang the parent text.

property.name: warichu
property.shortdesc: If true, turns on warichu.

property.name: warichuSize
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) to scale parent text size to determine warichu size.

property.name: warichuLines
property.shortdesc: The number of lines of warichu within a single normal line.

property.name: warichuLineSpacing
property.shortdesc: The gap between lines of warichu characters.

property.name: warichuAlignment
property.shortdesc: The warichu alignment.

property.name: warichuCharsAfterBreak
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of characters allowed after a line break.

property.name: warichuCharsBeforeBreak
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of characters allowed before a line break.

property.name: otfProportionalMetrics
property.shortdesc: If true, kerns according to proportional CJK metrics in OpenType fonts.

property.name: otfHVKana
property.shortdesc: If true, switches hiragana fonts, which have different glyphs for horizontal and vertical.

property.name: otfRomanItalics
property.shortdesc: If true, applies italics to half-width alphanumerics.

property.name: scaleAffectsLineHeight
property.shortdesc: If true, the line changes size when characters are scaled.

property.name: cjkGridTracking
property.shortdesc: If true, uses grid tracking to track non-Roman characters in CJK grids.

property.name: glyphForm
property.shortdesc: The glyph variant to substitute for standard glyphs.

property.name: rubyFlag
property.shortdesc: If true, ruby is on.

property.name: rubyString
property.shortdesc: The ruby string contents.

property.name: paragraphGyoudori
property.shortdesc: If true, the gyoudori mode applies to the entire paragraph. If false, the gyoudori mode applies to each line in the paragraph.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyDigits
property.shortdesc: The number of digits included in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyIncludeRoman
property.shortdesc: If true, includes Roman characters in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyAutoScale
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically scales glyphs in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby to fit one em.

property.name: treatIdeographicSpaceAsSpace
property.shortdesc: If true, ideographic spaces will not wrap to the next line like text characters.

property.name: allowArbitraryHyphenation
property.shortdesc: If true, words unassociated with a hyphenation dictionary can break to the next line on any character.

property.name: bulletsAndNumberingListType
property.shortdesc: List type for bullets and numbering.

property.name: bulletsCharacterStyle
property.shortdesc: The character style to be used for the text after string. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

property.name: numberingCharacterStyle
property.shortdesc: The character style to be used for the number string. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

property.name: numberingExpression
property.shortdesc: The number string expression for numbering.

property.name: bulletsTextAfter
property.shortdesc: The text after string expression for bullets.

property.name: appliedNumberingList
property.shortdesc: The list to be part of. Can return: NumberingList or String.

property.name: numberingLevel
property.shortdesc: The level of the paragraph.

property.name: numberingFormat
property.shortdesc: Numbering format options. Can return: NumberingStyle enumerator or String.

property.name: numberingContinue
property.shortdesc: Continue the numbering at this level.

property.name: numberingStartAt
property.shortdesc: Determines starting number in a numbered list.

property.name: numberingApplyRestartPolicy
property.shortdesc: If true, apply the numbering restart policy.

property.name: bulletsAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of the bullet character.

property.name: numberingAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of the number.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: autoTag
method.shortdesc: Tag the object or the parent story using default tags defined in XML preference.

method.name: markup
method.shortdesc: Associates the page item with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XML element.

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the Word.

method.name: convertToTable
method.shortdesc: Converts the text to a table.

parameter.name: columnSeparator
parameter.shortdesc: The character that starts a new column in the new table. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: rowSeparator
parameter.shortdesc: The character starts a new row in the new table. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: numberOfColumns
parameter.shortdesc: The number of columns in the table. Note: Valid only when the column and row separator characters are the same. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changecase
method.shortdesc: Sets the case of the text.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The text case option.

method.name: clearOverrides
method.shortdesc: Clears the specified types of override.

parameter.name: overridesToClear
parameter.shortdesc: The types of override to clear. &#40;Optional)

method.name: recompose
method.shortdesc: Recomposes the text in the Word.

method.name: showText
method.shortdesc: Jump to the text range.

method.name: applyParagraphStyle
method.shortdesc: Apply a paragraph style.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The paragraph style to apply.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clear any text attributes before applying the style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: applyCharacterStyle
method.shortdesc: Apply a character style.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The character style to apply.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the text in the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: Text, Story, Cell, Row, Column, Table or PageItem. &#40;Optional)

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the text to the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: Text, Story, Cell, Row, Column, Table or PageItem. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Places the file.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.shortdesc: The file to place

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object&#40;s) (Optional)

method.name: convertToNote
method.shortdesc: Converts the text to a note.

method.name: findHyperlinks
method.shortdesc: Finds hyperlink sources that intersecting with specified text range.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.shortdesc: The sort order of found ranges. &#40;Optional)

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The export style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: versionComments
parameter.shortdesc: The comment for this version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

method.name: asynchronousExportFile
method.shortdesc: asynchronously exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions

parameter.name: using

method.name: applyConditions
method.shortdesc: Apply one or more conditions.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The condition&#40;s) to apply

parameter.name: removeExisting
parameter.shortdesc: If true, remove existing conditions. &#40;Optional)

method.name: convertBulletsAndNumberingToText
method.shortdesc: Convert bullets and numbering to text.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the Word in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: createOutlines
method.shortdesc: Converts text to outlines. Each line of text becomes a polygon object. When the converted text is a single letter that has no internal spaces or detached parts, the polygon contains only a single path. Note: To determine whether a font allows the creation of outlines, see allow outlines.

parameter.name: deleteOriginal
parameter.shortdesc: If true, deletes the original text. If false, creates the outlines as separate object&#40;s) on top of the text.  (Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Word.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)
